verbose_text: Specifically, activation of SREBP1c and PPARgamma increases the expression of a series of enzymes which increase the synthesis and storage of triglycerides in adipose tissue, including lipoprotein lipase (LPL), which increases uptake of fatty acids from the circulation, and Fatty Acid Synthase (FAS) and glycerol-3-phosphate dehydrogenase (G3PDH), which both promote triglyceride synthesis [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: LPL), which increases uptake of fatty acids from the circulation, and Fatty Acid Synthase (FAS) and glycerol-3-phosphate dehydrogenase
